4 import rospy

6 import threading
7 import random
8 
9 from .utils import poses_too_close
10 
11 # Command Status
12 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
13 
14 # Messages
15 from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalStatus
16 from control_msgs.msg import FollowJointTrajectoryActionGoal
17 from control_msgs.msg import FollowJointTrajectoryActionResult
18 from control_msgs.msg import FollowJointTrajectoryActionFeedback
19 from moveit_msgs.msg import RobotState as RobotStateMoveIt
20 from moveit_msgs.msg import RobotTrajectory
21 from trajectory_msgs.msg import JointTrajectory
22 from visualization_msgs.msg import Marker, MarkerArray
23 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
24 from geometry_msgs.msg import Quaternion
25 
26 # Services
27 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger

30 # Enums

33 
34 class TrajectoriesExecutor:
35  """
36  Object which execute the Arm trajectories via MoveIt
37  """
38 
39  def __init__(self, arm_move_group):
40  self.__arm = arm_move_group
41  self.__joints_name = rospy.get_param('~joint_names')
42  self.__hardware_version = rospy.get_param('~hardware_version')
43 
44  # - Direct topic to joint_trajectory_controller
45  self.__current_goal_id = None
46  self.__current_feedback = None
47  self.__current_goal_result = GoalStatus.LOST
48  self.__collision_detected = False
49  self.__cancel_goal = False
50 
51  # Event which allows to timeout if trajectory take too long
52  self.__traj_finished_event = threading.Event()
53 
54  # Others params
55  self.__trajectory_minimum_timeout = rospy.get_param("~trajectory_minimum_timeout")
56  self.__compute_plan_max_tries = rospy.get_param("~compute_plan_max_tries")
57  self.__cartesian_path_eef_steps = rospy.get_param("~eef_step")
58 
59  # - Subscribers
60  joint_controller_base_name = rospy.get_param("~joint_controller_name")
61  rospy.Subscriber('{}/follow_joint_trajectory/goal'.format(joint_controller_base_name),
62  FollowJointTrajectoryActionGoal,
63  self.__callback_new_goal)
64 
65  rospy.Subscriber('{}/follow_joint_trajectory/result'.format(joint_controller_base_name),
66  FollowJointTrajectoryActionResult,
67  self.__callback_goal_result)
68 
69  # collision detected by End Effector could be a real or fake collision.
70  # In a movement, if a collision detected, that will be a real collision, without a movement, it will be fake
71  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/hardware_interface/collision_detected', Bool, self.__callback_collision_detected)
72 
73  # - Publishers
74  self.__traj_goal_pub = rospy.Publisher('{}/follow_joint_trajectory/goal'.format(joint_controller_base_name),
75  FollowJointTrajectoryActionGoal,
76  queue_size=1)
77 
78  self.__joint_trajectory_publisher = rospy.Publisher('{}/command'.format(joint_controller_base_name),
79  JointTrajectory,
80  queue_size=10)
81 
82  self.__reset_controller_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot/joints_interface/steppers_reset_controller',
83  Trigger)
84 
85  self.__collision_detected_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/collision_detected', Bool, queue_size=10)
86 
87  rospy.on_shutdown(self.cancel_goal)
88 
89  def __set_position_hold_mode(self):
90  """
91  Stop the Robot where it is
92  :return: None
93  """
94  msg = JointTrajectory()
95  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
96  msg.points = []
97  self.__joint_trajectory_publisher.publish(msg)
98 
99  def __reset_controller(self):
100  self.__reset_controller_service()
101  # very important delay to avoid unexpected issues from ros_control
102  rospy.sleep(0.05)
103 
104  # -- Callbacks
105  def __callback_new_goal(self, msg):
106  """
107  Happens when a new goal is published. Set the current goal
108  :param msg: Object containing info on the new goal
109  :type msg: FollowJointTrajectoryActionGoal
110  :return: None
111  """
112  # rospy.loginfo('CALLBACK NEW GOAL')
113  self.__current_goal_id = msg.goal_id.id
114  rospy.logdebug("Arm commander - Got a goal id : {}".format(self.__current_goal_id))
115 
116  def __callback_collision_detected(self, msg):
117  # The collision detected by EE is used only here. It just means if there is a movement.
118  self.__collision_detected = msg.data
119 
120  def __callback_goal_result(self, msg):
121  """
122  Function called when the action is finished
123  :param msg:
124  :return:
125  """
126  if msg.status.goal_id.id == self.__current_goal_id:
127  self.__current_goal_result = msg.status.status
128  rospy.logdebug("Arm commander - Result : ".format(self.__current_goal_result))
129  self.__traj_finished_event.set()
130  else:
131  rospy.loginfo("Arm commander - Received result, WRONG GOAL ID")
132 
133  # -- Executors
134  def compute_and_execute_plan_to_target(self):
135  """
136  Firstly try to compute the plan to the set target.
137  If fails a first time, will try ComputePMaxTries times to stop the arm and recompute the plan
138  Then, execute the plan
139  :return: status, message
140  """
141  for tries in range(self.__compute_plan_max_tries + 1): # We are going to try 3 times
142  # if we are re-trying, first stop current plan
143  if tries > 0:
144  self.stop_current_plan()
145  rospy.sleep(0.1)
146 
147  plan = self.__get_computed_plan()
148  if not plan:
149  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.PLAN_FAILED, "MoveIt failed to compute the plan.")
150 
151  if self.__hardware_version == 'ned':
152  self.__reset_controller()
153  rospy.loginfo("Arm commander - Send MoveIt trajectory to controller.")
154  status, message = self.execute_plan(plan)
155 
156  if status != CommandStatus.SHOULD_RESTART:
157  return status, message
158  if tries >= self.__compute_plan_max_tries:
159  rospy.logerr("Arm commander - Big failure from the controller. Try to restart the robot")
160  return CommandStatus.SHOULD_RESTART, "Please restart the robot and try again."
161  rospy.logwarn("Arm commander - Will retry to compute "
162  "& execute trajectory {} time(s)".format(self.__compute_plan_max_tries - tries))
163 
164  def __get_computed_plan(self):
165  """
166  Get computed plan from MoveIt
167  :return: the computed plan if MoveIt succeed else None
168  """
169  plan = self.__arm.plan()
170 
171  # handle changes between noetic / noetic
172  if isinstance(plan, RobotTrajectory):
173  return None if not plan.joint_trajectory.points else plan
174  else:
175  success, trajectory, planning_time, error_code = plan
176  if not success or not trajectory.joint_trajectory.points:
177  return None
178  else:
179  return trajectory
180 
181  def compute_and_execute_cartesian_plan(self, list_poses, velocity_factor=1.0, acceleration_factor=1.0):
182  """
183  Compute a cartesian plan according to list_poses and then, execute it
184  The robot will follow a straight line between each points
185  If the plan is not validate, raise ArmCommanderException
186  :param list_poses:
187  :param velocity_factor:
188  :param acceleration_factor:
189  :return: status, message
190  """
191  if len(list_poses) == 0:
192  return GoalStatus.REJECTED, "No Waypoints"
193 
194  try:
195  plan = self.compute_cartesian_plan(list_poses)
196  except Exception:
197  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.ARM_COMMANDER_FAILURE, "IK Fail")
198 
199  if plan is None:
200  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE,
201  "The goal cannot be reached with a linear trajectory")
202 
203  # Apply robot speeds
204  plan = self.retime_plan(plan,
205  velocity_scaling_factor=velocity_factor,
206  acceleration_scaling_factor=acceleration_factor,
207  optimize=False)
208  if plan is None:
209  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE,
210  "The goal cannot be reached with a linear trajectory")
211 
212  return self.execute_plan(plan)
213 
214  def compute_cartesian_plan(self, list_poses, compute_max_tries=None):
215  """
216  Compute cartesian plan from a list of poses
217  As 2 poses cannot be the same, the first operation is to filter list_poses to be sure this condition is met
218  :param list_poses: list of Pose Object
219  :param compute_max_tries: number of tries to compute the path, if None the default value will be taken
220  :return: Computed plan : RobotTrajectory object
221  """
222  if len(list_poses) == 0:
223  return None
224 
225  for i in reversed(range(len(list_poses) - 1)):
226  if poses_too_close(list_poses[i + 1], list_poses[i]):
227  list_poses.pop(i)
228 
229  fraction = 0.0
230  for _ in range(compute_max_tries if compute_max_tries else self.__compute_plan_max_tries): # some tries
231  trajectory_plan, fraction = \
232  self.__arm.compute_cartesian_path(list_poses, eef_step=self.__cartesian_path_eef_steps)
233 
234  # Check the fraction value : if 1.0, the trajectory can be linear;
235  # else, the trajectory followed won't be linear.
236  if fraction == 1.0:
237  # delete the very first joints position which is the starting position (current),
238  # to avoid an error related to increasing time
239  # del trajectory_plan.joint_trajectory.points[0]
240  return trajectory_plan
241  else:
242  rospy.logwarn("Linear trajectory not found, only {}% was successfully computed.".format(fraction * 100))
243  return None
244 
245  def execute_plan(self, plan):
246  """
247  Execute the plan given
248  Firstly, calculate a timeout which is : 1.5 times *the estimated time of the plan*
249  Then send execute command to MoveIt and wait until the execution finished or the timeout happens
250  :param plan: Computed plan
251  :type plan: RobotTrajectory
252  :return: CommandStatus, message
253  """
254  if not plan:
255  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE,
256  "You are trying to execute a plan which doesn't exist")
257  # Reset
258  self.__traj_finished_event.clear()
259 
260  trajectory_time_out = max(1.5 * self.__get_plan_time(plan), self.__trajectory_minimum_timeout)
261 
262  self.__current_goal_id = None
263  self.__current_goal_result = GoalStatus.LOST
264  self.__cancel_goal = False
265 
266  # Send trajectory and wait
267  self.__arm.execute(plan, wait=False)
268  if self.__traj_finished_event.wait(trajectory_time_out):
269  if self.__current_goal_result == GoalStatus.SUCCEEDED:
270  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Command has been successfully processed"
271  elif self.__current_goal_result == GoalStatus.PREEMPTED:
272  if self.__cancel_goal:
273  return CommandStatus.STOPPED, "Command has been successfully stopped"
274 
275  self.__collision_detected_publisher.publish(True)
276  self.__set_learning_mode(True)
277  msg = "Command has been aborted due to a collision or a motor not able to follow the given trajectory"
278  return CommandStatus.COLLISION, msg
279 
280  elif self.__current_goal_result == GoalStatus.ABORTED:
281  # if joint_trajectory_controller aborts the goal, it will still try to
282  # finish executing the trajectory --> so we ask it to stop from here
283  # http://wiki.ros.org/joint_trajectory_controller -> preemption policy
284  # Send an empty trajectory from the topic interface
285  self.__set_position_hold_mode()
286  self.__set_learning_mode(True)
287  self.__collision_detected_publisher.publish(True)
288  msg = "Command has been aborted due to a collision or a motor not able to follow the given trajectory"
289  return CommandStatus.COLLISION, msg
290 
291  else: # problem from ros_control itself
292  self.__current_goal_id = None
293  return CommandStatus.SHOULD_RESTART, ""
294  else:
295  # This timeout will happen if something fails in ros_control
296  # It is not related to a trajectory failure
297  self.__current_goal_id = None
298  return CommandStatus.SHOULD_RESTART, ""
299 
300  def plan(self):
301  for _ in range(self.__compute_plan_max_tries):
302  plan = self.__get_computed_plan()
303  if plan is not None:
304  return plan
305  else:
306  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE, "No trajectory found.")
307 
308  def execute_joint_trajectory(self, joint_trajectory):
309  """
310 
311  :param joint_trajectory:
312  :type joint_trajectory: JointTrajectory
313  :return:
314  :rtype:
315  """
316  moveit_plan = RobotTrajectory(joint_trajectory=joint_trajectory)
317  self.__arm.set_joint_value_target(moveit_plan.joint_trajectory.points[0].positions)
318  partial_plan = self.plan()
319  plan = self.link_plans(partial_plan, moveit_plan)
320  return self.execute_plan(plan)
321 
322  # --- Callable functions
323  def stop_arm(self):
324  rospy.loginfo("Arm commander - Send STOP to arm")
325  self.__arm.stop()
326 
327  def stop_current_plan(self):
328  rospy.loginfo("Arm commander - Send STOP to arm and RESET to controller")
329  self.__arm.stop()
330  self.__reset_controller()
331 
332  def cancel_goal(self):
333  self.__cancel_goal = True
334  self.stop_current_plan()
335 
336  def retime_plan(self, plan, velocity_scaling_factor=1.0, acceleration_scaling_factor=1.0, optimize=False):
337  """
338  Take a plan and retime it
339  """
340  start_state = self.__get_plan_start_robot_state(plan)
341  if self.__hardware_version == "one":
342  # for ros kinetic
343  plan_out = self.__arm.retime_trajectory(start_state, plan, velocity_scaling_factor=velocity_scaling_factor)
344  else:
345  if optimize:
346  algorithm = "time_optimal_trajectory_generation"
347  else:
348  algorithm = "iterative_time_parameterization"
349 
350  plan_out = self.__arm.retime_trajectory(start_state,
351  plan,
352  velocity_scaling_factor=velocity_scaling_factor,
353  acceleration_scaling_factor=acceleration_scaling_factor,
354  algorithm=algorithm)
355  return plan_out
356 
357  def __get_plan_start_robot_state(self, plan):
358  start_state = RobotStateMoveIt()
359  start_state.joint_state.header.frame_id = "world"
360  start_state.joint_state.position = plan.joint_trajectory.points[0].positions
361  start_state.joint_state.name = self.__joints_name
362  return start_state
363 
364  @staticmethod
365  def __get_plan_time(plan):
366  """
367  Extract duration from a plan. If it cannot be done, raise ArmCommanderException
368  :param plan: plan given by MoveIt
369  :type plan: RobotTrajectory
370  :return: duration in seconds
371  """
372  if plan and plan.joint_trajectory.points:
373  return plan.joint_trajectory.points[-1].time_from_start.to_sec()
374  else:
375  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE, "No current plan found")
376 
377  def link_plans(self, *plans):
378  # Link plans
379  final_plan = plans[0]
380 
381  for plan in plans[1:]:
382  final_plan.joint_trajectory.points.extend(plan.joint_trajectory.points)
383 
384  # Retime plan et recompute velocities
385  final_plan = self.retime_plan(final_plan, optimize=True)
386  return self.filtering_plan(final_plan)
387 
388  @staticmethod
389  def filtering_plan(plan):
390  if plan is None:
391  return None
392 
393  new_plan = RobotTrajectory()
394  new_plan.joint_trajectory.header = plan.joint_trajectory.header
395  new_plan.joint_trajectory.joint_names = plan.joint_trajectory.joint_names
396  new_plan.joint_trajectory.points = []
397 
398  for i, point in enumerate(plan.joint_trajectory.points[:-1]):
399  if point.time_from_start != plan.joint_trajectory.points[i + 1].time_from_start:
400  new_plan.joint_trajectory.points.append(point)
401  new_plan.joint_trajectory.points.append(plan.joint_trajectory.points[-1])
402  return new_plan
403 
404  def __set_learning_mode(self, set_bool):
405  """
406  Activate or deactivate the learning mode using the ros service /niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate
407 
408  :param set_bool:
409  :type set_bool: bool
410 
411  :return: Success if the learning mode was properly activate or deactivate, False if not
412  :rtype: bool
413  """
414  if set_bool and self.__hardware_version in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
415  return True
416 
417  try:
418  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate', timeout=1)
419  srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate', SetBool)
420  resp = srv(set_bool)
421  return resp.status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS
422  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
423  return False
424 
425  @staticmethod
426  def display_traj(point_list, id_=1):
427  topic_display = 'visualization_marker_array'
428  if topic_display in rospy.get_published_topics():
429  markers_array = rospy.wait_for_message(topic_display, MarkerArray).markers
430  else:
431  markers_array = []
432 
433  marker_pub = rospy.Publisher(topic_display, MarkerArray, queue_size=10, latch=True)
434 
435  cardboard_marker = Marker()
436  cardboard_marker.header.frame_id = "world"
437  cardboard_marker.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
438  cardboard_marker.ns = "trajectory"
439  cardboard_marker.id = id_
440  cardboard_marker.type = cardboard_marker.LINE_STRIP
441  cardboard_marker.action = cardboard_marker.ADD
442 
443  cardboard_marker.scale.x = 0.01
444 
445  cardboard_marker.color.r = random.random()
446  cardboard_marker.color.g = random.random()
447  cardboard_marker.color.b = random.random()
448  cardboard_marker.color.a = 0.8
449 
450  cardboard_marker.pose.orientation = Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1)
451  cardboard_marker.points = point_list
452  cardboard_marker.lifetime = rospy.Duration(0)
453  markers_array.append(cardboard_marker)
454  marker_pub.publish(markers_array)
